mapper.select: SELECT c.member_id as member_id, c.product_idx as product_idx, p.product_detail_info as product_detail_info, p.product_name as product_name, p.product_coloroption as product_coloroption, p.product_price as product_price FROM cart c, product p WHERE c.product_idx = p.product_idx and c.member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_form (order_idx, product_idx, member_id, order_date) VALUES (order_seq.nextval, #{product_idx}, #{member_id}, sysdate)

INSERT INTO order_detail (order_idx, product_idx, order_name, order_receiver_name, order_receiver_phonenumber, order_receiver_address, order_quantity, payment_method, order_date) VALUES (#{order_idx}, #{product_idx}, #{order_name}, #{order_receiver_name}, #{order_receiver_phonenumber}, #{order_receiver_address}, #{order_quantity}, #{payment_method}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ORDER_DETAIL WHERE order_idx = (select max(order_idx) from order_form)

select distinct d.delivery_state as delivery_state, d.delivery_idx as delivery_idx, f.member_id as member_id, f.order_date as order_date_str, f.product_idx as product_idx, o.order_idx as order_idx, o.order_quantity as order_quantity, p.product_name as product_name, p.product_price as product_price, t.filename as filename from delivery d, order_form f, order_detail o, product p, tbl_attach t where f.member_id=member_id and p.product_idx = t.product_idx and member_id = #{member_id} and p.product_idx = o.product_idx and o.product_idx = t.product_idx and o.order_idx = f.order_idx and d.order_idx = o.order_idx order by o.order_idx desc

SELECT d.order_date as order_date_str, d.order_idx as order_idx, d.product_idx as product_idx, d.order_quantity as order_quantity, d.payment_method as payment_method, d.order_receiver_name as order_receiver_name, d.order_receiver_phonenumber as order_receiver_phonenumber, d.order_receiver_address as order_receiver_address, d.order_name as order_name, u.user_phonenumber as user_phonenumber, p.product_name as product_name, p.product_detail_info as product_detail_info, p.product_price as product_price, v.delivery_state as delivery_state, t.filename as filename FROM users u, order_form f, order_detail d, product p, tbl_attach t, delivery v WHERE p.product_idx = t.product_idx AND u.user_name = d.order_name AND d.order_name = #{order_name} AND u.order_idx = d.order_idx AND d.order_idx = #{order_idx}

SELECT d.order_date as order_date_str, d.order_idx as order_idx, d.product_idx as product_idx, d.order_quantity as order_quantity, d.payment_method as payment_method, d.order_receiver_name as order_receiver_name, d.order_receiver_phonenumber as order_receiver_phonenumber, d.order_receiver_address as order_receiver_address, d.order_name as order_name, m.member_phonenumber as member_phonenumber, m.member_id as member_id, p.product_name as product_name, p.product_detail_info as product_detail_info, p.product_price as product_price, v.delivery_state as delivery_state, t.filename as filename FROM member m, order_form f, order_detail d, product p, tbl_attach t, delivery v WHERE p.product_idx = t.product_idx AND v.order_idx = d.order_idx AND m.member_name = d.order_name AND f.member_id = m.member_id AND f.member_id = #{member_id} AND f.order_idx = d.order_idx AND d.order_idx = #{order_idx}
